chart.name: invoice-chart-bar
chart.title: Unpaid Invoices per Customer
chart.dataset: SELECT p.name as customer,COUNT(i.id) as invoices FROM Invoice i INNER JOIN Party p ON p.id = i.party WHERE i.status != 3 AND p.isCustomer ='t' AND i.dateTime BETWEEN :fromDateTime AND :toDateTime group by p.name

chart.name: customer-chart-pie
chart.title: Customer per State
chart.dataset: SELECT a.state.name as state,Count(p.id) as customers FROM Party p INNER JOIN p.addressList a WHERE p.isCustomer='t' GROUP BY a.state.name

chart.name: invoice-status-chart-bar
chart.title: Amount per Status
chart.dataset: select status as status,sum(gross_amount) as amount from gst_invoice group by status;

chart.name: invoice-status-count-chart-line
chart.title: Total Invoices per Status
chart.dataset: select status as status,count(id) invoice from gst_invoice group by status;

chart.name: invoice-category-product-chart-bar
chart.title: Paid Invoices per Category per Product
chart.dataset: SELECT p.name as product,c.name as category,COUNT(i.id) as invoices FROM Invoice i INNER JOIN InvoiceLine l ON i.id = l.invoice INNER JOIN Product p ON l.product=p.id INNER JOIN ProductCategory c ON p.productCategory = c.id WHERE i.status=3 AND (i.dateTime BETWEEN :fromDateTime AND :toDateTime) GROUP BY p.name,c.name
